front: 心血管系统 (xīn xuè guǎn xì tǒng)
subject: medicine
example: The cardiovascular system transports oxygen and nutrients to tissues throughout the body.

back: 心血管系统 (xīn xuè guǎn xì tǒng)
subject: medicine
example: Understanding the cardiovascular system is essential for medical students.

subject: medicine
example: An artery carries blood away from the heart to various parts of the body.

subject: medicine
example: A blockage in a major artery can lead to a heart attack.

subject: medicine
example: El sistema cardiovascular es esencial para la circulación de la sangre.

subject: medicine
example: The cardiovascular system includes the heart, arteries, and veins.
